page.title: 16Attitudes Survey in Tremorfa
page.content: Over 50% of the people we interviewed thought that loneliness was their main worry.95% of people thought that the pavements and rods needed repairing badly.25% thought that there was enough for young people to do in Tremorfa but the rest thought that there wasn't.People in the Tremorfa area said that thingsd that disturb them the most were;traffic noise,people taking drugs,unemployment in the4 area,people who break into houses,old people getting mugged and robbed and children glue sniffing.Other things that concerned people about their general lives in 1985 were;they don't have enough money,plane hijacking.A lot of the lod people who were interviewed were very concerned about being mugged,attacked and burgled.
